values:
We're selling the house in Oakville. It looks like I'll be moving into an apartment with my dad in Toronto and my mum will be living in Burlington. I saw this coming. Home life wasn't exactly stable. I'm surprisingly fine with the whole situation. Well, I am upset and such but it's not as if I didn't have any emotional baggage before. I'm actually looking forward to the move, I fucking hate Oakville. I'm tired of plazas and SUVs and soccer moms and shopping malls. I'm going back to the city and I'm estatic. I'll find myself a job and prove that I can be self-reliant and since it looks like we'll be living downtown (or somewhere very close to downtown) my social life will be a thousand times better. I don't know, I feel as if I'm finally going back to where I belong. I know this is going to make my parents happy. My dad will be making more money since he'll be in the city and my mum will be closer to her work. I'll still be going to Sheridan but I don't mind the commute. 

We were originally going to put the house on the market in March but it looks like it may be sooner. We're all kind of anxious to leave. I wouldn't mind having the closing date sometime in November. Moving away would be an excellent 18th birthday present.

Holy hell I love my kitty. I'm convinced he's the sweetest thing in the entire world. I was sitting with him just now and every time the pipes in the house made a noise, he jumped a little and ran over to where I was sitting and ran beneath my legs. I had to lift him up, he was all scared. He also likes to sit in front of my monitor and try and bat at the mouse as it moves across the screen. It's cute, but he likes to walk all over my keyboard too -__- I'm going shopping tomorrow! Like, omigod, there's a sale. Actually, I'm going with Nathan and we'll probably end up walking around town or something. We're planning something big for next week. Fear and Loathing in Oakville. I totally got my G1 bitches. About fucking time.

Tomorrow is a Flexiday (TM)


I kinda sorta really want this dress for prom:




Sorry random LJ girl for stealing your picture.

"The dinosaurs did not die as a direct result of the asteroid's impact, they died because the asteroid raised the overall atmospheric temprature of the earth by a few degrees. Dinoasaurs, and most other lizards, determine if their baby will be male or female not by the chromosomes it contains, but by atmospheric temperature. The increased atmospheric temperatures caused the dinosaurs to die out over a couple of generations, as 99.9% of progeny born was female." Fuckin' dinosaurs.

I saw a sign outside of store on Saturday while out with Mike, Liz, Sally and Matt. It said "Come check out our packages, our pants are half off!"

Am I only one that saw that as INCREDIBLY sexual? Seriously, it was a hilarious sign, I'm sure whoever put it up must have realized what they were saying.

I'm having a weird day today. I fell alseep watching Invader Zim last night at like 7 and I slept until 8:45 this morning. I'm still exhausted and I don't know why. Maybe I'm not feeling too well, I'm kind of down and out of it. I watched a lot of Invader Zim and I hung out with Ryan a bit. Nothing really interesting happened today. I got my hair cut and I bought Fahrenheit 451.  

Friday night was neat, Mike came over and we had pizza and watched Hellraiser. He slept over and stayed until Saturday afternoon. It was awesome, I love him so much. 

All of a sudden I have this craving for all these material things that I never really wanted before. That's weird for me but I feel like going shopping and getting stuff I don't really need. That's not true. I need new pants so I'm going to get those, and my dad said he'd buy me a pair of shoes because he's proud of me. That's pretty sweet. 

I won some award at school, I have to go to this special luncheon and collect it, I don't know what it's all about. Some "Championship Award" deal. 

Um, I'm not the same person I was a year ago. I'm trying to figure out when I changed, why I changed and whether or not it's a good thing. I don't think it is. Sam said something about me being a better person before, or more of a person, or something like that. I don't know. I'm half a person now, I don't feel whole right now. I haven't felt whole since last summer.

I was cast in the play that Melissa is directing, I'm rather pleased. Rehearsals are every Tuesday until 4:30, that's easy enough. I didn't even have to audition! Someone dropped the role and Melissa was desperately trying to find someone to fill it and I volunteered. She's rather happy with me now I think, she wanted me to audition in the first place but I was stubborn and refused. 

I quit my job but I did it nicely, I'm still on call whenever they need me but I won't be going in every weekend anymore. That's a load off my mind. 

Things are coming together so well right now. I'm happy. I'm actually fucking HAPPY. I'm going to Sheridan, I've got some money in the bank, I can fuck around with my hair again and my documentary is being submitted to the Halton Film Festival. I got my Foods mark up from 16%(!!!!) to a 73% in the course of a couple weeks, I'm graduating in two months and life is grand. I have the most wonderful boyfriend in the world and I don't think I could ask for anything from him. <3 <3 <3 I'm going to Mike's tomorrow and sleeping over, it should be totally kickass. First, I have to go to this info session at Sheridan. I'm so excited!

"I must assimilate more food into my collective. And by 'collective', I mean 'stomach'. And by 'assimilate', I mean 'eat'."

Val and I are super dorky.

Andy is getting an LJ, this terrifies me.

I'm seeing Mike tomorrow, this makes me estatic.

I'm moving my room around today, this will most likely make me tired. 

It's my parents anniversary, my dad was like, "do you want to eat dinner with us?" and I was like "It's your anniversary" and he's like "Yes, but you're the reason we got married in the first place"
I laughed.

A beautiful crystal in my eye
Amends my sight
Intensify
Multiply
I might look into your face
But I see the sky

Without you - Day is nothing but a waste of light
Without you - I am lost, I vanish in the night
Without you - Life is but a senseless waste of time
Without you - Everything I dream turns black and white

A German filmmaker is thinking about making a movie about Armin Meiwes. God I hope that goes through, that would be fucking amazing. 
Poor Armin is back in court, he might have to serve more time in jail. Bah.

I stole this from

Reply with a message and I'll tell you something I adore about you.
Afterwards, copy and paste this into your own journal

I went to Mike's yesterday, it was amazing. He gave me Hocico's Signos de Aberraclon CD which made me very happy. We watched Sin City and Invader Zim and like, five minutes of the Jacket. I really love being with him and I'm missing him right now :(

Alright, today is super busy day. I have to write up a couple things for school, take the 12:30 train into the city, do some filming with , come home, and do this project for foods class with this girl Rebecca. I'm going to explode. Next week is midterms though so I can just finish up everything and be freeeeeeee. Freeeeeee! No more impending deadlines, no more job hanging over my head, no more dire responsibilities. I need to de-stress and whatnot. In the meantime, I think I'll have to come in at lunch to finish editing my documentary. Shit! I need to finish my graphics project too! Shit shit shit.
I'm off to do all that.

"Haben sie einen Mercedes?"
"Ja, ich haben einen Mercedes."
"Kanne ich es haben?"
"... Nein."

I have so many thoughts in my head right now, I can't seem to focus on one or make a decision about anything. 

I'm quitting my job tomorrow. I'm seeing Mike on Saturday. I'm filming on Sunday. I'm going to school on Monday. I'm going to the doctor's again on Tuesday. 

I'm never going to get all my schoolwork finished but I'm trying to think positively. I'll get it done eventually. I'm getting an 85% in Religions, I never expected that. I need to finish my graphics project and my documentary and do a report for Foods class. My english teacher baked us bread this morning, it was very tasty. I also think I'm the only person in the class who doesn't hate our current reading material. 

I can't wait until Saturday. The last couple of weeks have been stressful in regards to school and work and the only thing that has gotten me through the last three weeks is the thought that I'll be seeing Mike on the weekend. Think of every sappy romantic song you can think of. That about sums up my feelings right now. 

I heard the new VNV Nation album. I'm so glad I didn't have to pay to hear it.

Woo hoo!
I checked my email at school and found an email from Sheridan. I got accepted!

THAT'S NOT ALL!

I came home and saw a package by the door. What was it? Well, I got accepted to Humber as well! :D:D:D
Now it's a matter of choosing which one I'm going to go to.. squeeeeeee! I'm so glad I got in!!!

I also got paid tonight so I have a bit of cash. Yay! I'm not broke! And I don't have to work tomorrow night! And I'm seeing Mike on Sunday!
*does a happy dance*

I went to PCC today and talked to one of the ladies there. It was very refreshing because she's going to talk to a couple of my teachers for me so I can get my workload lightened. Thank god. I'm one step closer to sorting everything out.

Things are starting to look up. I've got my doctor's appointment rescheduled to Thursday and I'm seeing Mike this weekend :D. He's waaaay too awesome to even comprehend, I'm so lucky. :D

I got into an arguement with Sam today which was unfortunate. I said a few things I shouldn't have but I think it was only because of all the pent up emotion that has been building up over the last few days.

I saw Dustin today at lunch, it was rad! I had to leave and study for my religions test but it was good to see him nonetheless, he said he may be back tomorrow. It was weird, Ryan and Dustin and Andrew and I were hanging out and it was like a flashback to a few months ago. Right down to Andrew stealing my food, grrr.

Quote of the day: "I'm going to get a music note tattooed just below my ear... that's where music goes in!"
Well! Thanks Nathan, shine on you crazy diamond.

Just got back from Mike's house.
One word pretty much sums up everything:
"Wow".

I'm incredibly nervous for tomorrow, and excited at the same time. I have to remember to bring the camera and monopod and film and whatnot, that's the whole reason I'm going to see Mike in the first place :P heh. 
Um, really, that's all that's on my mind. I keep thinking about tomorrow. Of course because I'm paranoid as hell, I'm thinking about all the ways I can fuck things up. Right now I need a big hug but no one is around to give me one :(

I was invited to go out with Dustin and Ryan tonight but I turned it down because I had a huge headache. I haven't seen Dustin in forever, he still calls me "Nipples", tee hee. I'm kind of in a weird mood right now, I just feel like being by myself even though I'm feeling incredibly lonely. I don't want to go outside or face anyone. I don't even want to be inside. I tried watching a movie today and switched it off halfway through, my brain is everywhere and nowhere at once, I can't focus. My headache is gone now though, but this weird tummy feeling is lingering.

Family is over right now so I'm hiding in the basement. What else is new.

I worked tonight and I didn't go insane. I made a new friend at work, she's invited me to go out to parties and out drinking with her despite the fact she's at least five years my senior. She's an artsy type like me which is nice because I lack people to go to art galleries and see foreign films with. She also lives right around the block from me, fun!
I rented 12 Monkeys and Mad Max and I think tomorrow will be a gooood day. Sunday will be better though. Much much better.

By the way, Andy has a new rant. It's not so much a rant as it is him blabbing about his job, but it's funny nonetheless.
At one point, he claims to get women. I can safely say he is a dirty filthy liar. :D

Baaaah, so hungry.

So I'm sitting in commtech right now.. sort of doing work. I'm making a brochure cover or something. Yeah, it's exciting. I have no idea whether or not my ideas are any good, I need some feedback from the teacher but he's busy so I'm just sitting and waiting. Ah well.

Um, yeah. All I've been thinking about is seeing Mike. I can't wait until Sunday, it's driving me nuts that it's so close yet... so far *looks dramatic*. He's officially the awesomest person ever. <3

BLARGH, SCHOOL!
I didn't have to write a test today because of my "recent hospitalization and absence". Awesome. I'm looking forward to the long weekend even though I have to work on Friday night, bah. Work equals money though and money equals happiness. Or something.

Can't. Fucking. Wait. Until. Sunday.

Well, I'm alive. I went to the plaza today with Sam and we went to Tim Hortons for cookies. We ended up just grabbing some freshly baked ones that looked like chocolate chip. Turns out they weren't. I devoured a whole peanut butter and chocolate chip cookie before I realized, "Oh shit."
Called my dad, waited and waited in pain and he showed up with my antihistemine. It didn't do anything. I was getting a little panicky. When I got home I realized that I had to go to the hospital, so we left. I could barely breath by the time I got there. I had thrown up, my throat was swollen and my chest was so tight I wasn't sure I'd make it. I did, thankfully. I got treated right away and had all sorts of needley things stuck into me and whatnot. I stayed there for five hours and just got home now. What a night. I had absolutely no idea I was anywhere remotely that allergic to peanuts. Usually it's a bit of uncomfortable swelling which goes away quickly but this was intense. I'm glad I went to the hospital, I don't know what would have happened if I didn't.

There's my adventure. It wouldn't have happened if it wasn't for my stupidity and Sam's insistence on getting cookies (I kid, I kid).

One of the drugs they gave me made me reeeeeeally sleepy, so I'm going to bed soon.

Ryan's an asshole and I jsut wish he told me that our friendship was worth nothing to him so I would stop trying to make it work. I should have gotten the hint when he started avoiding me.
I'm so fucking naive and so fucking needy, no wonder everyone is so sick of me.
It's my fault for being such a shitty person to be around I guess, but I didn't expect this kind of shit from Ryan. God this hurts. This hurts a whole fucking lot and I don't know if I can trust him anymore.

I don't need this right now, not with so many other things going wrong.

Edit: JESUS FUCKING CHRIST. Now Andy is pissed off at me, I fucking fail at life

personality tests by similarminds.com Trait snapshot: paranoid tendencies, irritable, anxious, fidgety, dependent, worrying, emotionally sensitive, prone to regret, depressed, second guesses self, somewhat fragile, dislikes change, prefers organized to unpredictable, suspicious, phobic, craves attention, not a risk taker, low self control, very sensitive to criticism, unadventurous, does not make friends easily, defensive, obsessive, low self esteem

You know, I'll never lose my deep rooted love for the Virgin Prunes, Sex Gang Children, Suspiria, Christian Death and all that ilk. 

So so good.
A little something I did for commtech class, I say it's not bad for something I had five weeks to work on. I did it this morning.

Anyone feel like going into Toronto with me to see The Downfall?
Probably tomorrow, I have to work tonight. I don't know if it's going to open up anywhere else but so far the only two theatres showing it are in Toronto.

I'm starting to think that there are probably a bunch of guys that think I'm hitting on them when really I'm not meaning to. I just don't think of flirting and whatnot and I'm completely oblivious if it's directed at me. It just goes right over my head. Of course, there are a few guys that I do flirt with (or I attempt to) but most of the time I'm just being friendly and such. Um, one example comes to mind and I bet he's going to start avoiding me now because he thinks I like him.


I bought:
-a pair of camo pants, British patten
-a mousepad in the shape of a human head with all sorts of mechanical parts inside
-a book on digital art, a book by Philip K. Dick (The Man in High Castle, I finished it last night) and an Instant German book
-lots of chocolates
-a skirt from Dorthy Perkins

In the same day I saw two films, Me, Myself and the Universe (Ich und Das Universum) and Grandpa's Still in the Tuff Shed AND I went to two different art galleries and a cafe. It was all very cultured.
I went drinking with my cousins, I explored Edinburgh by myself and I also saw a bit of this Danish film called the Idiots.
I like British television, advertisements and news broadcasts, I like British men and I like British chocolate.

I hate Heathrow airport and I hate children on airplanes.
I'm tired, I'm grumpy, I'm pissed off and my internal clock is 5 hours ahead. I've been up since 3 in the afternoon yesterday. I'm home though, thank god, so everyone can rejoice.

I'm posting from London, I'm at Heathrow  right now. I paid a pound for some internet time at a kiosk, how sad am I? My connection flight to Edinburgh is in an hour. I wanted to sneak on the Lufthansa flight to Frankfurt SO BADLY.
I kind of wish I stayed home, it's odd. This is supposed to be a vacation but my mother drives me nuts. It's more of a punishment being here with her than a vacation. I know I'll regret saying that.

Anyway, running out of time. Bye lovlies!
I fucking panic when I don't have a net connection, what the hell am I going to do on this vacation? *sigh*

"...And up next is some NamNamBulu. NamNamBulu. NamNamBuluuu. What a STUPID band name."

I agree with you 100% Ekim.

Um.. I leave for Scotland today, I'm excited. I have to finish packing and I have a 101 and one things to do before I go. For one, I have to talk to Conrad before I leave. I think I'm getting an internet crush. At least I've talked to him on the phone. I don't think I can stress how hot his accent is. I found myself a cute German and the only problem is that he's in fucking Germany.
I also have to take some pictures. I don't know how you do it 
it's such a chore for me to take pictures yet you seem to do it every day. Oh well.

I won SAW on DVD from and his radio show. That's pretty awesome.

I decided today would be a snow day. There's a ton of snow on the ground (and it keeps coming!) so I figured that's a good excuse to skip school. 

Yesterday I had a nice talk with Ryan. By talk, I mean I broke down in fucking tears and didn't stop crying for a good half hour while he wished he was someplace else. I miss having Ryan to talk to. 
Don't bother asking me why I was crying, I couldn't tell you. 

I have two assignments due (one for English and one for Foods), four articles to find and "reflect" on, a presentation to do this afternoon and I want to throw myself into traffic.
What else is new.
I saw a license plate today that said "KNOWLDGE". I laughed and laughed.

I went into Toronto yesterday and got coffee and lunch with Daniel. It was nice, I don't see him as often as I should. We had the most emotional conversation while out for coffee, it was brutal. We were just discussing life and where we were going and who we left behind and who drifted away, etc etc. It was very upsetting actually but I'm glad we had that talk, it was comforting in its own way. I really do depress everyone around me.

I'm reading Microserfs by Douglas Coupland, I like it.

I leave for Scotland this Friday. I'm so incredibly excited, Scotland has been my favourite place since I was a little girl. I was dreading going because of missing work and school but I got everything sorted out so there's no problem and now I'm home free. Two weeks of temperate (rainy) Scottish weather, sheep, family, drinking with my cousins and lots and lots of British cigarettes. Unfortunately, I'm going to miss 's birthday which is a downer. What I'm worried about is getting stopped at the airport, it always happens. It's usually because of the boots, or the metal or something, it's a pain.

I have a paper to write, it has to be four pages long. It was due on Friday. I have no motivation to do anything anymore, that's why I'm keen on going to Scotland because I like running away from all my problems. I don't know, I need to get this checked out. I can't focus, I'm not motivated, I have no ambition and no attention span. I'm always tired, irritable and my emotions are so unstable it's pathetic.

I want to leave so badly.

I love Boyd Rice a whole fucking lot. <3

In other news, my father feels like he failed in his parental duties because I'm not a "happy" person. Sooooo, I'm going to the doctor to see what he can do.

I'm a big bundle of horny, I want to attack half the boys I see.

I was going to say something else but I forget.

Oh! I saw Constantine. I really hate new movies.

So Andy just left. We went into Toronto yesterday, I bought bondage cuffs and a cute new sweater. We went into Northbound Leather. I hadn't been before and I was pretty impressed, they have some lovely stuff in that store. We ended up going home kind of early and skipping dinner to watch a movie. Today, we went to the surplus store and watched Saving Private Ryan. It was nice. I think Andy and I have lost our spark though, we spend a lot of time arguing. It makes me sad that I can't even keep one fucking guy in my life. I'm losing him just like I lost Ryan and every other guy friend. 

What else makes me sad is how everyone around me is either in a relationship, fooling around with someone or has some sort of love life. I'm rarely outside of a relationship and when I am, it makes me really upset. I don't know, I guess I define my worth based on whoever I'm dating. If I'm not dating anyone, I'm worthless. I suppose I ought to get some self esteem but I don't know anywhere that sells it. 
God, I've really hit a new low. I'm depressed because every girl I'm friends with has a guy that likes her. Just because I don't this automatically makes me less of a person. The way I see it, it means I'm unattractive or my personality is shit. Probably both, but that's not the point. 

On a brighter note, I love this band/artist/project. Hindu Pez = awesome. I haven't been this enthusiastic over music since I came across Klangstabil.

Oh, and the last thing I want is someone saying "oohh, I like you Alex, you should feel better, blah blah blah". I'm not in the mood for sympathy, I just needed somewhere to rant.

Jesus FUCKING CHRIST.
There was one fucking movie I wanted to see with Andy and it's not playing at the Royal anymore. It ran for  less than a week :( 
Now we have nothing to do Saturday night. I really wanted to see that movie too, I think I'm going to go and cry.

I love how outraged I should be, but I don't care at this point. I'm actually starting to be happy. I have a job, my marks are good, there's no reason I shouldn't be able to get into college. 
I realize that I essentially have no life. I don't go out into Toronto often, I don't drink, I don't ever party, etc etc. I realized that I like my life this way. Yes, I complain about it, but if I really wanted to change, I would have done so by now.
I know that a lot of people must think I'm pathetic, but I'd rather be home alone or with one other person I really love than with a bunch of idiots I don't even like getting smashed off my ass. 
Yes, I hate Oakville. Yes, I hate high school. Yes, sometimes I feel like I'm so completely walled in and trapped that I'll go insane. But I also know that all this will pass and I'll move on to bigger and better things. I'll go off to college, study something I actually enjoy, meet new people, move out, travel and do everything I want to do.
I think I want to travel more than anything. I'd love to sell off everything and spend forever moving from country to country. It's Spalding wanderlust apparently, my dad says it always kicks in about this age.

Stolen. Duh.



Edit: I hate solitare and everything it stands for.

"All the cool kids are doing it. And by cool, of course I mean non-conformist, non-mainstream cool. Like, uncool cool. Anti-cool."
It's true. Sex with ugly people makes me hip. Oh god, who am I kidding. I'm not even scoring with the ugmos. :(

I went to Humber College for an assessment today, I am SO PROUD. I actually left the house and went somewhere I had never gone before without having some sort of anxiety attack. I wrote an essay, filled out a questionaire and did a grammar test. Then I wandered around campus. I applied to the Media Foundation program and I really want to get in. It covers everything -- webdesign, digital imagining, photography, journalism, film surveying, internet surveying (and research!) and design techniques. Sounds delicious

I'm looking for new experiences this week.

My fucking jacket zipper broke.

I didn't bother going to school today.

I worked out after I popped into work and saw Sam.

Last night was pretty nice. I had a weird stay-at-home day because I was sick, so I didn't do much of anything except write and clean. I ended up reading a whole shitload of stuff last night and talking to Valerie and going through some old photographs. It was quite possibly the best nostaglic lapse I've had in a long time. I forgot how awesome the combined powers of Val and Alex are.

I also stumbled across pictures from last winter with Sam and I (and Ryan!) and some of our silly photoshoots. We look so unbelievably young. And I look so god damned GOTHY. I forgot how long my hair used to be. It was sexy. 

I was looking at rating communities on lj and thinking that I should reeeeeeeally start putting effort into how I look. I probably won't, but I should.

<lj-cut text="I stole this from Val"> 
1. First name: Alexandra

2. Were you named after anyone? Alexander is a family name

3. Do you wish on stars? Yes

4. When did you last cry? Umm, a couple days ago maybe? 

5. Do you like your handwriting? I like it a lot. It's tiny and neat for the most part

6. What is your favorite lunch meat? Turkey

7. If you were another person, would YOU be friends with you? Maybe. It depends on what kind of other person I'd be. If I had low tolerance, than no.

8. Are you a daredevil? HA. No.

9. Have you ever told a secret you swore not to tell? Nah, I take pride in the fact people can talk to me about stuff and I won't say a thing to someone else. 

10. Do looks matter? Yes, they do

11. How do you release anger? I used to paint. Now I just smush it down and repress it. :D

12. Where is your second home? I don't have one

13. Do you trust others easily? Yes and no. I have no secrets to trust anyone with, so ... it's not a factor that comes into play often

14. What was your favorite toy as a child? I uhh.. I don't remember much of my childhood

15. What class in high school do you think was totally useless? Career Studies

16. Do you have a journal? Other than this one? I have about five strewn across my room

17. Do you use sarcasm a lot? No, I don't. (Hint: that was sarcasm)

18. Favorite movies: Run Lola Run, Enemy at the Gates, Cabaret

19. What are your nicknames? Alex, Alexapple, Buttons and all the variations of the word (Butans, Busans, Butnas, etc)

20. Would you bungee jump? Hell no. I hate heights

21. Do you untie your shoes when you take them off? I wear boots most of the time, so yes. My running shoes for working out and such though don't get untied

22. Do you think that you are strong? I'm getting stronger every day. I'm surprisingly musclular in my legs and arms. It's obviously nothing grotesque, but more of a hidden muscle thing 

23. Favorite ice cream? Cookie dough!

24. What is your least favorite thing about yourself? My lack of perspective and a number of aspects of my personality

25. Who do you miss most? Four people: Val, Andy, Sam and Ryan

26. Do you want everyone you send this to send it back? Nah

27. What color pants are you wearing? ..... gray and light blue :( I'm wearing pajamas

28. If you were a crayon, what color would you be? Black or gray. Do they even have gray crayons?

29. What is the weather like right now? Below zero

30. Last person you talked to on the phone: I talked to Andy last night until he fell asleep

31. The first thing you notice about the opposite sex? Well it goes in this order: Eyes, hair, smile, body, clothing

32. Do you like the person who sent this to you? I stole it from Val and I should hope I like her

33. How Are You Today? Still sick

34. Favorite Drink? Right now, tea 

35. Favorite Sport? Don't have one

36. Hair Color? Right now, it's red. It'll be black again soon 

37. Eye Color? Brown

38. Do you wear contacts? Nope, I wear glasses sometimes

39. Favorite Food? Usually pizza, but I'm trying to healthier

40. Favorite pet? I want a kitty
